/usr/lib/nvidia-cuda-toolkit/bin/g++ -pthread CMakeFiles/merge.dir/merge.cu.o -o merge  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/openmpi/lib/libmpi.so -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl  -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/stubs" -L"/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu"
